articles.title: Do More With Alexa's 'Tell Me When' Skill - PCMag
articles.description: Alexa's new skill update combines reminders with additional contextual information that lets you set up a variety of different tasks.

Amazon's Alexa is capable of completing a variety of tasks, like setting reminders. Now, that particular skill is even more robust.
